import React, { lazy,useContext,useEffect } from 'react' import { CBadge, CButton, CButtonGroup, CCard, CCardBody, CCardFooter, CCardHeader, CCol, CProgress, CRow, CCallout } from '@coreui/react' import CIcon from '@coreui/icons-react' import ArticleProvider from "../../context/ArticleContext" import MainChartExample from '../charts/MainChartExample.js' const Dashboard = () => { const {articles,fetchArticlesApi,fetchArticleByIdApi,resetEditArticle,resetArticle,setEditMode,setArticle,setCurrentArticle,editMode,selectedImageEn,selectedImageFr,validateArticle,toast,modal,setModal,setToast,article,updateArticle}=useContext(ArticleProvider.Context) useEffect(()=>{ fetchArticlesApi() },[]) return ( <> All Posts { articles.length && articles.map((post)=>( )) }
Title Status Category Type posted
{post.title_en}
Edit | Posted: {post.created_at}
{post.status}
{post.category}
{/*
Jun 11, 2015 - Jul 10, 2015
*/}
{/* */}
Last login
10 sec ago
) } export default Dashboard
